pr_title: SAK-43118 Remove timezone from signup meeting dates.

timeline.bodyText: a custom format doesn't seem right to me...... why doesn't the DateFormat above work?
timeline.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: It ships the default full format, with timezone. And you can't merge pattern changes.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: If you look at the docs for DateFormat, it explains that if you want to change the default, you have to cast to a SimpleDateFormat and customise.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: You can tune DateFormat to a degree, by using SHORT, MEDIUM, LONG etc, but that's all.
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText:
Still just seems more preferable to use a pre-defined format. For example, in your format, "a" means am/pm, right?
So let's just use MEDIUM instead of LONG to avoid timezone
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: I thought you'd be able to merge formats, like, just merge am pm into MEDIUM
replies.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Sweden doesn't want am/pm. They want 24 hr time
replies.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: SHORT was actually the one to go for, for the time component. I've tested in Swedish, and PST, and this PR fixes that bunch of Signup timezone tickets.
replies.author: adrianfish
